turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, could you get me a coffee from Starbucks please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Where would you like me to get it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Market Square in downtown Pittsburgh.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like me to order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like an Iced Cinnamon Dolce Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What kind of milk would you want that made with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk, like always.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, definitely.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you'd like with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you get me an extra shot of espresso in that? I'm pretty tired this morning.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, make that two extra shots of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, and light ice please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so you want a Venti Iced Cinnamon Dolce Latte with whipped cream, whole milk, two extra shots of espresso, and light ice.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, it will be ready shortly. I'll go pick it up. The receipt will be texted to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much! I'll see you soon.
